input.sentences: everyone was having a great time .
people sat under the tents to stay out of the sun .
what a great day everyone had .
output.sentences: As I was riding to work, i saw what was the greatest challenge of my life.
So with a fist full of joy, i peddled down to the Trail Trek.
I soon discovered, i was not alone on this challenge.
We all prepared for this massive challenge.
Til we made it to the end. Victorious.
